messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Film / Storytelling
messages.msgSnippet: I love that. I love movies, stories,books, photography and commercials/adivertazing ( yes even those!). Alex Polikowsky
messages.messageBody:
I love that. I love movies, stories,books, photography and commercials/adivertazing ( yes even those!).


Alex Polikowsky
 
 
 


________________________________
From: Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, October 30, 2011 2:38 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Film / Storytelling


 
-=- Film is your 21st Century version of ancient fireside storytelling-
with filmmakers as your modern day shamans, sitting around a virtual
campfire, passing down myths and dreams.-=-

Even down to the light flickering in a darker room.

Seriously. :-)

Sandra

messages.subject: Film / Storytelling
messages.msgSnippet: I saw this today, like it so well that I wanted to share - Lisa W. Long ago, gathered around the fire, human beings created language. But what did they talk
messages.messageBody:
I saw this today, like it so well that I wanted to share -

Lisa W.




"Long ago, gathered around the fire, human beings created language. But what did they talk about? Undoubtedly, the first words ever uttered must have been . . . Tell me a story.

This is, the greatest connection we all share: our stories. Film is your 21st Century version of ancient fireside storytelling-with filmmakers as your modern day shamans, sitting around a virtual campfire, passing down myths and dreams. "

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
